
Changelog
=========

0.4.0 - (2012-04-08)
--------------------

* Clean up package
  [aclark]

0.3.0 - (2011-07-27)
--------------------

* Support ``eggs`` parameter for develop eggs, etc.
  [aclark]

* Add logger
  [aclark]

* Add metadata to setup.py
  [aclark]

0.2.0 - (2011-07-27)
--------------------

* Create var dirs if they do not exist
  [aclark]

* Include package data
  [aclark]

0.1.0 - (2011-07-27)
--------------------

* Initial release
  [aclark]
